lead_paragraph: SPIEGEL--Helen, passed away on April 8, 2016, at the age of 95. Loving wife of the late Aaron. Adoring mother of Cindy (Peter) and Shari (Alan). Doting grandmother of Rachel, Jonathan and Eli. 1/3
